column4: I'm having trouble configuring my audio card. Could anyone point me in a direction to make the correct choices?
Is there an auto-config wizard for audio devices or something?
My audio card has worked before, but it is not working now.
When I go to preferences -> Sound and try different configurations the sound tests "work"
Audigy 2 ZS
Creative.
When I run test on the different options in Sound Preferences I hear a long beep on some, nothing on others and some won't configure at all to test.
okay
Do you see "Audigy A"?
No,
How many channels do you see?
Card: PulseAudio    Chip: PulseAudio   View: [Playback] Capture  All     Item: Master
K_Code: Just one, master.
are you viewing the Windows version or the command line version?
er...
What do you mean? I opened a terminal and typed alsamixer.
ok, press sideways, I think you're not seeing them all
K_Code: No I already tried that :(
K_Code: okay I pressed f5 and got it to show all, but I only see master and captur
Can anyone help me with my Audio card? I'm in the alsamixer and I've tried using the sound preferences but I can't seem to get anything to come out :/
Have you tried "alsa force-reload"
No, one moment.
